channel.title: Null Object Pattern on Mark Needham
channel.description: Recent content in Null Object Pattern on Mark Needham

item.title: Null Handling Strategies
item.description: I mentioned in an earlier post my dislike of the passing of null around code, and since then there have been a couple of posts on the subject on the ThoughtWorks blogs. I had always thought that was a silver bullet for the way that we can handle null objects in our code but it seems from reading other people’s opinions and from my own experience that this is not the case (surprise, surprise!
